analysis.key_quote: Making grantmaking decisions under the control of politically appointed bureaucrats will erode the ability of our country to perform research at the highest level, and erode the bipartisan decision making that goes into funding research.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the politicization of grantmaking decisions, indicating that it would undermine the integrity of research and bipartisan decision-making, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
